content.body: The sacrament of baptism is but once to be administered unto any person.
content.name: Confession of Faith
content.title: Chapter 28: Of Baptism

content_with_prooftexts.body: The sacrament of baptism is but once to be administered unto any person.1
content_with_prooftexts.name: Confession of Faith

prooftexts.1:
Titus 3:5

he saved us, not because of works done by us in righteousness, but according to his own mercy, by the washing of regeneration and renewal of the Holy Spirit, (ESV)
